channel.title: How do I host a server/client?
channel.description:
OK, I dont know if this is where my question should go, but Im gonna take a crack at it anyway.
How do you like, host a server? I've gone to the http://no-ip.com thing and made one, but how do I turn it online or whatever?

item.title: How do I host a server/client?
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Wow… the no-ip is just a free domain name, so players don’t have to type your IP. You run the server on your computer…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I host a server/client?
